channel.title: Possible dice scam?
channel.description:
Well
today i was a dice host, i had well over 1.5B+ But then this kid came and diced me for 200M, he won, then again for 400M, he won, and last 500M to clean me, he won. I managed to keep 200-300M because i scammed him, but then i did some searching like how did he win all those stakes in a row..
found this out in topdice, one of the most known dicing websites
DO NOT ACCEPT THE CERTIFICATE OF THIS SITE UNLESS YOU WISH TO OBTAIN A VIRUS. IF YOU ALREAY DID, SCAN YOUR COMPUTER! -snip-
They say the only way to evade this is resetting your dice ( Switching sides ), and avoid being snipped. Also logging out and back in.

item.title: Possible dice scam?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ah, I didn’t know he had posted it before. I actually checked his infraction log too to see if he had any previous infractions.

Oh well, I’ll keep it here as a warning to others about the site, otherwise it may just be posted again and nobody will know.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible dice scam?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:4, topic:408120”]Thank god I was suspicious about the site when I looked at it and didn’t accept the certificate:

Here’s a snippet of the page source:

[code]

[/code][/quote]
This is the 2nd time he posted this, and no one muted/moderated or anything.
Why is this topic even here still?

[quote=“m.dog311, post:6, topic:408120”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=509403.msg3695775#msg3695775 date=1312415836]
Thank god I was suspicious about the site when I looked at it and didn’t accept the certificate:

Here’s a snippet of the page source:

[code]

[/code]
[/quote]
Ye, we figured this out like 2 days ago when he first posted it.[/quote]
Yeah, you got drivebyed didnt you?

Read full topic
